external_games.name: Divinity: Original Sin 2 - Companion: Sir Lora the Squirrel

name: Divinity: Original Sin II - Definitive Edition: Companion - Sir Lora the Squirrel
summary: Sir Lora is a squirrel fleeing the Knights of Drey - an apocalyptic order of furry knights who believe in the coming of the Great Acorn. He’ll join you in Fort Joy (along with his undead cat mount).
